extensionDescription.message: Confirm mailaddress and attachments based on flexible rules.

confirmMultipleRecipientDomainsTitle.message: Multiple recipient domains in To or Cc

confirmMultipleRecipientDomainsMessage.message:
There are multiple recipient domains in To or Cc.

$DOMAINS$

All recipients information will be disclosed to all other recipients. Do you really want to send this message?

confirmAttentionDomainsMessage.message:
These recipients with attention domains are found:

$RECIPIENTS$

If there is no problem, continue to send.

confirmAttentionSuffixesMessage.message:
These attachments with attention extensions are found:

$ATTACHMENTS$

If there is no problem, continue to send.

confirmAttentionSuffixes2Title.message: Attachments with more attention file types

confirmAttentionSuffixes2Message.message:
These attachments with more attention extensions are found:

$ATTACHMENTS$

If there is no problem, continue to send.

confirmAttentionTermsTitle.message: Attachments including attention term in their name

confirmAttentionTermsMessage.message:
These attachments including attention term in their name are found:

$ATTACHMENTS$

If there is no problem, continue to send.

alertBlockedDomainsMessage.message:
These recipients with blocked domains are found:

$RECIPIENTS$

It is not allowe to send messages to such recipients.

config_confirmationMode_onModified_descr.message: Confirmation will appear when recipients are modified, something text is copied and pasted from any message with different decipients, or text longer than

config_skipConfirmationForInternalMail_l.message: Skip confirmation if all recipients are internals

config_minConfirmationRecipientsCount_la.message: Skip confirmation if there are/is only

config_confirmMultipleRecipientDomains_l.message: Confirm when there are multiple domains in To/Cc recipients

config_allowCheckAllInternals_label.message: Allow to make all internal recipients to be checked with one checkbox

config_allowCheckAllExternals_label.message: Allow to make all external recipients to be checked with one checkbox

config_userRules_remove_confirmMessage.message: Are you sure to remove the rule "$NAME$" ?

config_userRule_highlight_withAttachment.message: Only when there is any attachment

config_userRule_highlight_externals.message: Only when there is any external recipient

config_userRule_highlight_externalsWithA.message: Only when there is any external recipient and attachment

config_userRule_action_caption_recipient.message: When there is any matched recipient:

config_userRule_action_caption_attachmen.message: When there is any matched attachment:

config_userRule_action_reconfirmWithAtta.message: Re-confirm only when there is any attachment

config_userRule_action_reconfirmExternal.message: Re-confirm only when there is any external recipient
Re-confirm only when there is any external recipient and attachment

config_userRule_action_blockWithAttachme.message: Disallow to send messages only when there is any attachment

config_userRule_action_blockExternals.message: Disallow to send messages only when there is any external recipient

config_userRule_action_blockExternalsWit.message: Disallow to send messages only when there is any external recipient and attachment

config_userRule_itemsLocal_placeholder_r.message: Input a domain name per line (e.g. example.com)

config_userRule_itemsLocal_placeholder_a.message: Input a term per line (e.g. important, confidential)
Input a file extension per line (e.g. .exe, .pdf)

config_userRule_itemsFile_caption.message: Use a list given as a file

config_userRule_itemsFile_button_dialogT.message: Choose a list of domain names
Choose a list of file extensions

config_userRule_confirmMessage_caption_r.message: Message for confirmation (\"%S\" will be filled with recipients):

config_userRule_confirmMessage_caption_a.message: Message for confirmation (\"%S\" will be filled with attachment names):
Message for confirmation (\"%S\" will be filled with attachment names):

config_attentionDomains_caption.message: Specially alerted external domains in recipients

config_attentionSuffixesConfirm_label.message: Confirm me again before send, if there is any attachment with one of these extensions in a message to external domains

config_attentionSuffixes2Confirm_label.message: Confirm me more again before send, if there is any attachment with one of these extensions in a message to external domains

config_attentionTermsConfirm_label.message: Confirm me again before send, if there is any attachment name with one of these terms in a message to external domains

config_requireReinputAttachmentNames_lab.message: Require to input file names of attachments, if there is any other domain recipient

config_allowCheckAllAttachments_label.message: Allow to make all attachments to be checked with one checkbox

config_countdownAllowSkip_label.message: Allow to skip countdown to send the mail immediately

config_requireCheckBody_label.message: Require to check the message body

config_largeFontSizeForAddresses_label.message: Show addresses with larget font size

config_alwaysLargeDialog_label.message: Open confirmation dialog with large size always
